title: Huge did you know/tips textbox at start of game. how to disable?
body: I have been having this issue for a few weeks now. Whenever I load into a game a giant text box at the top of the screen and leaves when minions spawn. I mustve enabled it by accident and cant figure out how to disable it. Help would be appreciated

replies.body:
That's a little odd that those tips are showing up so big, let's see if we can make them go away entirely. I believe the option you're looking for is "Enable Newbie Help Tips" which you can find in the client options.

https://i.gyazo.com/7cf2980c0619f56344a7f90db8b66fce.png

Thanks for the reply! and that has been disabled for a while now. I linked a few pictures to show you my dilemma
